title: subdatasets() (and others) reporting issue
body:
I am in a full checkout of the HCP dataset, and I run:

```
% datalad subdataset -d . -r
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100206 (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100206/MNINonLinear (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100206/T1w (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100206/unprocessed (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100307 (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100307/MEG (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100307/MNINonLinear (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100307/T1w (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100307/unprocessed (dataset)
subdataset(ok): HCP1200/100408 (dataset)
```

I get the output above almost immediately, but then nothing else happens. Looking with `-l debug` DataLad is very busy though:

```
...
[DEBUG  ] <AnnexRepo path=/ds/hcp/human-connectome-project-openaccess/HCP1200/100408 (<class 'datalad.support.annexrepo.AnnexRepo'>)>.get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done <AnnexRepo path=/ds/hcp/human-connectome-project-openaccess/HCP1200/100408 (<class 'datalad.support.annexrepo.AnnexRepo'>)>.get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] <AnnexRepo path=/ds/hcp/human-connectome-project-openaccess/HCP1200/100610 (<class 'datalad.support.annexrepo.AnnexRepo'>)>.get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard'] 
...
```

but not reporting anything. It eventually completes and reports all results at once.

This smells bad and is not what should happen.
